snippet: "Listen, my dear lord.—'Respectedfather and liege Sovereign,—Know, that importantconsiderations induce me to take my departure fromthis your court, purposing to make my abode atFalkland, both as the seat of my dearest uncle Albany, with whom I know your Majesty would desire me to use aU famUiarity, and as the residenceof one from whom I have been too long estranged,and with whom I haste to exchange vows ofthe closestaffection from henceforward.'"
